text:
are the signs and symptoms of Chilaiditi syndrome? The symptoms of Chilaiditi syndrome vary. Chronic recurrent abdominal pain is a common finding. Other symptoms might include nausea, vomiting, constipation, indigestion, difficulty swallowing, and abdominal tenderness, especially in the upper, central area. In some cases, breathing problems may develop.",GARD,Chilaiditi syndrome
What causes Chilaiditi syndrome ?,"What causes Chilaiditi syndrome? The exact cause of Chilaiditi syndrome is unknown
